overview: “David Annan leads Diversinet’s technology product and service delivery operations. Prior to Diversinet, Mr. Annan was Chief Technology Officer of Wysdom Inc. before undertaking the role of President and Chief Operating Officer. As CTO at Wysdom, Mr. Annan’s core responsibility was to oversee and manage Wysdom’s technology operations including research, product development and software engineering as well as coordinating international solution and service integrations. In the years prior to joining Diversinet, Mr. Annan was Senior Partner at Talus Strategy and Senior Vice President, Technology with GiantBear before its acquisition by InfoSpace. Mr. Annan also has extensive engineering and operations experience at operators such as Rogers Wireless, Lanser PCS and Bell Canada.” (Source: Diversinet)
